Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Addison/Central Avenue
ShortDescription: EB 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Irving Park, Austin and Addison, due to police activity at Addison/Central Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Irving Park, Austin, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to police activity at Addison/Central Avenue.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
